short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A straightforward to-do list so you can stay organized!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A lightweight, open-source to-do list that exists solely in your browser! No more annoying pop-ups, extra windows, or long loading times. If you want a simple to-do list to organize your thoughts and boost your productivity, then this is for you!
